description:
Ethernal was a multiplayer dungeon generated and owned by the players. Built on the blockchain, Ethernal Mumbai ran on Matic Mumbai Testnet from August 7, 2020 to November 22, 2020.

As a token of gratitude to our top players—who have bravely explored the dungeon, generated rooms, and defeated monsters—we are gifting this special NFT, created with historical data on the blockchain from the nine floors generated in the Ethernal dungeon.

✩ Top 20 players:
subimpact, Butchy, Spliff, Menathor, Mozzie, STAN, Montaurus, Xa, Squapple, Liamandora, mettlife, Konohime, HasH, hauSJanda, Legustos, JiullRock, Sanya, Mizu, RihpmaD, JTobcat.
name: History of Ethernal Alpha Mumbai (Top 20)
